General.Name: Ablerex Electronics Co Ltd
General.Description: Ablerex Electronics Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells uninterruptible power supplies (UPS) and power quality devices for use in industrial and informatics applications in Taiwan. The company offers energy storage systems; photovoltaic devices; UPS products and accessories; modular and wall mount active power filters; automatic transfer switches; and battery monitoring systems, as well as power management systems and active harmonics filters. Ablerex Electronics Co., Ltd. was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 3, Baogao Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 23144
